channel.title: If you arent Moparisthebest Don't read
channel.description:
Well, I'm payback is a bitch or w.e... Anyways, Just got banned for ban evading. Well, I was banned for the stupidest shit ever. Well I didn't care. So, a year later I make another account. And I just got banned. Well, If you didn't know why I got banned for. It was because I said Silab couldn't ban. Yes, and she said she could request it and in some weird ass way I got banned.
http://www.sureproxy.com/nph-index.cgi/011110A/http/moparisthebest.org/smf/index.php/topic,244008.msg2061494.html#msg2061494 (I'm using a proxy so... but this was on moparscape, so you might have to change up the url)
That's the thread it was in, but unfortunately its been deleted maybe it was in my last few post on my other account. But, ya.. I think I'm being bullshitted in the way I was banned.
[center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/warnmute.gif[/img] See below post.[/center]

item.title: If you arent Moparisthebest Don't read
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

There are proper ways and improper ways to dispute a ban, this is an improper way.

Read full topic
item.source: If you arent Moparisthebest Don't read
